questions.question: What is the chemical formula of nickel bis(dicarbollide)?
What method was used for the installation of manganese oxide in NU-1000 and NiCB@NU-1000?
What is the estimated electrical conductivity of NiCB@NU-1000?
How was the loading of manganese oxide in the framework determined?
questions.answer: By digesting the spin-coated thin film and measuring the UV-vis spectrum of the obtained solution

questions.question: What was the effect of installing NiCB in NU-1000 on its BET surface area?
questions.answer: The BET surface area of NU-1000 decreases from 2215 m^2/g to 1260 m^2/g after installation of NiCB

questions.question: True or False: The crystallinity of Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000 is preserved after the installation of manganese oxide.
What was the specific capacitance of manganese oxide in Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000 at a charge–discharge current density of 0.02 mA/cm^2?
True or False: The performance of Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000-based capacitor decreases to about 65% of its initial value after 200 cycles of the charge-discharge process.
What was the main reason speculated for the performance drop of the Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000-based capacitor?
questions.answer: Partial detachment of the spin-coat thin film during the initial stage of the long-term cycling

questions.question: True or False: The installation of NiCB in NU-1000 significantly affects the loading of manganese oxide in the framework.
What was the loading of NiCB per Zr6 node in NiCB@NU-1000?
True or False: The electrical conductivity of NiCB@NU-1000 is higher than that of pristine NU-1000.
What was the method used to estimate the electrical conductivity of NiCB@NU-1000?
questions.answer: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy with a spin-coated thin film of NiCB@NU-1000

questions.question: True or False: The BET surface area of NiCB@NU-1000 increases after the installation of manganese oxide.
What was the effect of NiCB installation on the emission spectrum of NU-1000?
questions.answer: Significant quenching of the emission was observed for NiCB@NU-1000, suggesting an efficient electron transfer from the excited TBAPy linkers to NiCB

questions.question: True or False: The loading of manganese oxide in Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000 is less than in Mn-AIM-NU-1000.
What was the main challenge identified for improving the long-term stability of the Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000-based capacitor?
questions.answer: Finding a better approach to deposit the thin film of Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000 with a better adhesion

questions.question: True or False: The crystallinity of the Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000 thin film is lost after 2000 cycles of the charge-discharge process.
What was the electrochemically addressable fraction of installed manganese sites in Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000 at a charge-discharge current density of 0.02 mA/cm^2?
True or False: The performance of the Mn-AIM-NiCB@NU-1000-based capacitor remains constant throughout the 2000 cycles of the charge-discharge process.
